title: 声东击西
description:
我们谈论技术和创新，也聊电影、城市和未来。这里有一手的现场观察和体验，还有不定期出现的神秘嘉宾。你可以感受星球大战粉丝大会现场的沸腾，也能想象一下未来世界里的出行，以及美国年轻人都在关心什么新鲜事儿。
网站：etw.fm
来信请寄：etwstudio@gmail.com 
微信和Instagram：etwstudio
新浪微博：@声东击西ETW
author: ETW Studio

title: 99% Invisible
description:
Design is everywhere in our lives, perhaps most importantly in the places where we've just stopped noticing. 99% Invisible is a weekly exploration of the process and power of design and architecture. From award winning producer Roman Mars. Learn more at 99percentinvisible.org.  

A proud member of Radiotopia, from PRX. Learn more at radiotopia.fm.
author: Roman Mars

title: The Economist Radio (All audio)
description: The Economist was founded in 1843 "to throw white light on the subjects within its range". For more from The Economist visit http://shop.economist.com/collections/audio
author: The Economist

title: 博物志
description: bowuzhi.fm 一档关于博物馆的播客。
author: bowuzhi 070384

title: 保持冷静
description:
《保持冷静》是一档由郝海龙和 Erika 主持的两性类播客节目。在没有性教育的国度，我们只能自我教育。请各位保持冷静，我们的节目马上开始。

郝海龙，诗人，Podcaster，比特新声联合创始人。
Erika，妇产科医师，女性性学方向研究者。
author: 郝海龙 & Erika

title: Merriam-Webster's Word of the Day
description: Build your vocabulary with Merriam-Webster's Word of the Day!  Each day a Merriam-Webster editor offers insight into a fascinating new word -- explaining its meaning, current use, and little-known details about its origin.
author: Merriam-Webster

title: The Guardian's Audio Long Reads
description: The Guardian's Audio Long Reads podcasts are a selection of the  Guardian’s long read articles which are published in the paper and online. It gives you the opportunity to get on with your day whilst listening to some of the finest journalism the Guardian has to offer: in-depth writing from around the world on immigration, crime, business, the arts and much more.
author: theguardian.com

title: The English We Speak
description: Every week, we look at a different everyday English phrase or piece of slang in this fun three-minute programme. From BBC World Service
author: BBC Radio

title: 锵锵三人行🎬
description:
主持人与两位嘉宾三友闲聚，大胆言论。在谈笑风生的气氛中以个性化的表达，关注时事资讯，传递民间话语，交流自由观点，呈现生活体验，不掩真实性情，分享聊天趣味。


（由于某些原因，凤凰网/凤凰视频/凤凰FM上的锵锵三人行都没了，所以停更了目前人肉更新音频版）
帮助 | 反馈: 🐦Twitter: @kyleehee
author: iFeng

title: 潘吉Jenny告诉你|学英语聊美国|开言英语 · Podcast
description: 学地道英语、聊美国文化！公众号: 开言英语 有节目文本和更多内容！
author: OpenLanguage 英语

title: 一席
description:
听君一席话，胜读十年书。
「一席」致力于有价值的传播，从2012年8月起，每月一期，邀请人文、科技领域有故事、有智识的嘉宾前来分享见解、体验和对未来的想象。
官网：www.yixi.tv  
新浪微博：@一席YiXi   
微信：yixiclub
author: 一席

title: 味之道
description: 《味之道》是由席妙雅主持的美食播客。美味是感性的体验，但同时需要开放的心态和眼界，以及精准的判断力。用味道来检验美食，不谈风月，不聊情怀。
author: 席妙雅

title: 太医来了
description:
《太医来了》由 IPN 出品、由前骨科医生初洋和妇产科医生田吉顺主持，是中文互联网第一档医生谈话类播客。节目里没有老专家讲养生，只有几个医生聊聊医院里的事儿，顺便给大家做做科普。
https://taiyilaile.com
taiyilaile@ipn.li
